name: Storytime Shadows
description:
Storytime Shadows allows you to illustrate classic fables using your very own shadow puppet characters. Awkwardly twist and bend your hand models and watch your quirky cast of puppets bounce across the screen."

Ever miss those childhood nights of projecting shadowed stories on your wall? In Storytime Shadows, illustrate classic fables through custom-controlled hand models and make these stories come alive! Through meticulously/painstakingly/awkward hand controls, detail your exact vision for your unique shadow puppet cast of characters. With no right or wrong way to tell these tales, the possibilities for your characters in Storytime Shadows are endless!

Have excessive and meticulous control over your hands to exactly translate your creative vision into shadow puppet characters. Using both your keyboard and mouse, use tactile and cumbersome technique to conform your hands in a way reminiscent of those childhood storytelling nights!
